original_text: Immediately the message given to Nebuchadnezzar really happened. People chased him away from the city. He ate grass as cows do. Dew from the sky made his body wet. His hair grew very long, like the feathers of an eagle. His feet became like a bird's feet.
korean_text: 바로 그 때에 이 일이 나 느부갓네살에게 응하므로 내가 사람에게 쫓겨나서 소처럼 풀을 먹으며 몸이 하늘 이슬에 젖고 머리털이 독수리 털과 같이 자랐고 손톱은 새 발톱과 같이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: Immediately the message given to Nebuchadnezzar really happened
sentences.korean_translation: 즉시 느부갓네살에게 주어진 메시지가 정말로 일어났다

sentences.original_text: People chased him away from the city
He ate grass as cows do
Dew from the sky made his body wet
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘에서 온 이슬이 그의 몸을 적셨다

sentences.original_text: like the feathers of an eagle
His feet became like a bird's feet
